overview: Night Walk for Edinburgh is a 50 minute film that takes you on a walk through Edinburgh’s Old Town with headphones and a mobile device. Following Janet Cardiff’s voice and walking in her footsteps, participants are led through the backstreets of the Old Town, unravelling a disjointed tale – part game-playing, part surrealistic poetry, perhaps even a murder mystery – layered with history, invention and memories.
title: Night Walk for Edinburgh
